text: If I edit/replace an image in Files that is used in a Sent Email, will it update the image in the already sent email? Or is the image cloned and paired with the email at that point for historical purposes?
I believe it should update but some email clients do cache images, so they may take awhile to update or not at all. You could test it with a test send to yourself.
I donâ€™t believe mixing programmable email and editable content works well.
